ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the Cluster FGM Summary Parameters (spin averaged). The parameters are a status word, the three averaged components of the magnetic field vector in the GSE coordinate system and 2 variances.

Parameter.Name: Cluster FGM Summary Param Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Description: Cluster  Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer magnetic field vector at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster FGM Summary Param Magnetic field magnitude
Parameter.Description: Cluster Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer magnetic field magnitude at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster FGM Summary Param Normalized Magnetic Field Variance Summed B_nsigma_t
Parameter.Description: Cluster Summary Parameter  Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized magnetic field variance summed, which is equivalent to the sum over the component variances, at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster FGM Summary Param Normalized Variance of the Magnetic Field Magnitude B_nsigma_b
Parameter.Description: Cluster  Summary Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer normalized variance of the magnetic field magnitude at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Cluster FGM Summary Param Status
Parameter.Description: Cluster  Summary  Parameter Fluxgate Magnetometer status at spin time resolution
